price: Intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), yavuze iti: “Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Mu vy’ukuri aba bantu banje, narabahamagariye ku kwemera ijoro n’umurango;
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
